trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around June 16th 2013
divs: sighting detailsat 9:10pm i was closing the blinds in the back room when my husband and i observed a glowing orange\red object traveling north to south. i couldn't believe my eyes. i thought for a split second could this really be what i think it is. my mind had to catch up with my eyes. we ran outside to get a clearer look. it was not an airplane. i grew up 10 miles from o'hara field and i know what a plane looks and sounds like. this object was silent. i ran in the house and grabbed my camera and was able to get 3 pictures before it disappeared over the tree line. i remember thinking while i was taking the pictures to keep a steady hand. i rested my arms on top of the fence so the camera would not shake. a few minutes later we heard helicopters. when i got into the house and downloaded the pictures i was amazed that the object i thought was traveling in a straight line was really zig zaging every where. i will never forget this event as long as i live. from that moment on my eyes are always looking up and camera ready. denise in springfield illinois
Summary: husband and I observed a glowing orange/red object I snapped 3 pictures
